text: Baluna, ‘ami tomaderake bali na ye, amara nikata allah‌ra bhandarasamuha ache, ara ami gayebo'o jani na ebam tomadera e'o bali na ye, ami phiris‌ta, amara prati ya ahirupe prerana kara haya, ami to sudhu tara'i anusarana kari.’ Baluna, ‘andha o caksusmana ki samana hate pare?’ Tomara ki cinta kara na
